text:
Finding the angle between 2 vectors given vectors as linear combinations with angles

\begin{array}{l}\nu=\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{3}\right) i+\sin \frac{\pi}{3} j \\\nv=\cos \frac{3 \pi}{4} i+\sin \frac{3 \pi}{4} j\n\end{array}[imath]u=\cos \left(\frac{\pi}{3}\right) i+\sin \frac{\pi}{3} j [/imath] [imath]v=\cos \frac{3 \pi}{4} i+\sin \frac{3 \pi}{4} j[/imath]
